<h3 id="X13907">X(13907)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND OUTER-YFF TANGENTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a+b+c)*(a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*a^2+(a^4-2*(b^2+3*b*c+c^2)*a^2-2*(b+c)*b*c*a+(b^2-c^2)^2)*S  :  :  <p>X(13907) lies on these lines: {1,1336}, {6,13965}, {11,13896}, {371,10532}, {485,12116}, {590,10527}, {6460,10902}, {8976,10943}, {8980,12190}, {8981,10680}, {8987,12687}, {8988,12750}, {8991,13095}, {8992,13110}, {8994,12382}, {8995,13122}, {8997,13190}, {8998,13218}, {9540,11249}, {10804,13885}, {10806,13886}, {10835,13889}, {10949,13895}, {10957,13897}, {10959,13898}, {10966,13901}, {11401,13884}, {11510,13887}, {11883,13890}, {11884,13891}, {11915,13894}, {11958,13900}, {12001,13903}, {12357,13908}, {12431,13909}, {12704,13912}, {12776,13913}, {12875,13914}, {12906,13915}, {13106,13916}, {13107,13917}, {13119,13918}, {13135,13879}, {13279,13922}, {13314,13923}, {13717,13920}, {13840,13848}</p>
